data.title: Who we work with
data.meta_description: We are a Christian charity with nearly 30 years of experience.  We started supporting the homeless, poor and needy in 1989, founded initially as a debt advice service and were the first food bank nationwide.
data.text:
Join us in celebrating 35 years of Derby City Mission!

This year Derby City Mission celebrates 35 years of making a positive impact in the city of Derby. Join us on September 22nd 2024 to celebrate and give thanks. Hear stories from volunteers and the people we've helped, meet our team, and enjoy live music and refreshments. We hope to see you there!

Derby Ramathon

I work for Safe Space and want to see more lives changed!

Christianity Month 2024 - What's going on?

An action-packed calendar full of fantastic events for all ages in Derby City this May 2024.

James Duffield

Food Bank Donations

Your donations are invaluable to us. Last year, we fed over 6000 individuals through our food parcels in conjunction with our Debt and Advice Clinics. Here's how you can help -

Homeless of Derby

Providing food, shelter and companionship for the homeless, working with them towards a more positive future

Debt & Advice Clinics

Our Jubilee Debt and Advice clinics are now open! The Jubilee Programme offers FREE debt advice at our clinics, across the City. Food parcels are also available to those in particular financial need.

Children at Christmas

Many children in Derby won't receive any gifts this Christmas. Christmas Connections is a way that those children who would otherwise have nothing, get to receive a gift and the message of hope at Christmas.

What is Safe Space?

Safe Space is our project for entrenched rough sleepers, providing a daytime and overnight space with support to move on.

Community Shop & Café

Our Community Shop & Café is a mini-supermarket offering a solution to those experiencing food insecurities along with a place to meet others, learn new skills and get support.

Mission

WE EXIST TO MAKE DISCIPLES OF EVERY PEOPLE GROUP IN PARTNERSHIP WITH CHURCHES AND OTHER AGENCIES BY DEMONSTRATING GOD’S LOVE AND BRINGING HOPE

Racheal Ita

Volunteer for Us

You can make a difference. Join our 500 strong volunteering team.

Someone in need?

Do you now someone on the streets that needs a safe place to sleep? Do you know of someone who is in debt and is in desperate need of support? Read more here
